script.title: drain-vrrp-ext.slax
script.author: rvandegrift
script.synopsis: This script drops VRRP priority for all groups if a named apply-group is configured at the top level.
script.description: This is an extended version of drain-vrrp that adds support for vrrp-inet6-groups, object tracking and priority-cost, VRRP group inheritance. This also refrains from emiting config in the VRRP subtree on interfaces that do not have VRRP configured. This version does NOT maintain support for JUNOS prior to 9.2.
